name: Biriyani
description: A flavorful rice dish with layers of spiced meat and potatoes.
cookingMethod: Layering and cooking the rice and meat with aromatic spices and herbs.

name: Fish curry
description: A spicy and tangy curry made with freshwater fish and served with rice.
cookingMethod: Cooking the fish in a tangy tomato-based curry with spices and mustard oil.

name: Dal
description: A comforting lentil soup served with rice and other dishes.
cookingMethod: Boiling the lentils with spices and aromatics until they are tender and creamy.

name: Shorshe ilish
description: A signature dish of Bangladesh made with the rich and flavorful hilsa fish.
cookingMethod: Marinating the fish in mustard paste and spices before frying it in mustard oil.

name: Beef bhuna
description: A slow-cooked beef curry with a rich and spicy sauce.
cookingMethod: Slow-cooking the beef with spices and aromatics until it is tender and flavorful.
